00048 /**************************************************************************\
00049  *
00050  *  File: mia_jump_opti.c
00051  *
00052  *  Description: jump optimizations for Ltahoe
00053  *
00054  *  Authors: John W. Sias
00055  *
00056  *
00057 \**************************************************************************/
00058 /* 09/17/02 REK Updating to use functions from libtahoeop instead of Tmdes. */
00059 
00060 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00061 #include <config.h>
00062 #include "mia_internal.h"
00063 
00064 #define DEBUG_BR_TGT_EXPN 0
00065 
00066 /*
00067  * Mopti_branch_target_expansion
00068  * ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00069  * Select arcs for expansion.  Target arcs to single-predecessor cbs
00070  * (no code expansion cost) and, heuristically, important, high-probability
00071  * arcs to small cbs (some code expansion cost)
00072  */
00073 
00074 int
00075 Mopti_branch_target_expansion (L_Func * fn)
00076 {
00077   L_Cb *cb, *ncb;
00078   int change = 0, ichg;
00079   L_Flow *nfl;
00080 
00081   do
00082     {
00083       ichg = 0;
00084 
00085       for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb; cb = ncb)
00086         {
00087           L_Cb *dst_cb;
00088           L_Oper *br;
00089           L_Flow *fl;
00090           int chg = 0;
00091 
00092           ncb = cb->next_cb;
00093 
00094           for (fl = cb->dest_flow; fl; fl = nfl)
00095             {
00096               int dst_sz;
00097               double tk_prob = 1.0;
00098 
00099               nfl = fl->next_flow;
00100 
00101               if ((br = L_find_branch_for_flow (cb, fl)))
00102                 {
00103                   tk_prob = L_find_taken_prob (cb, br);
00104 
00105                   /* Cannot expand through a register branch */
00106                   if (L_register_branch_opcode (br))
00107                     break;
00108                 }
00109 
00110               dst_cb = fl->dst_cb;
00111 
00112               /* Disallow unrolling */
00113 
00114               if (cb == dst_cb)
00115                 continue;
00116 
00117               if (L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cb->flags, L_CB_SOFTPIPE) ||
00118                   L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (dst_cb->flags, L_CB_SOFTPIPE) ||
00119                   L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (dst_cb->flags, L_CB_EPILOGUE))
00120                 continue;
00121 
00122               dst_sz = L_cb_size (dst_cb);
00123 
00124               /* JWS 20030730 - new heuristic for determining
00125                * when to inline a block using predication.
00126                * Consider average IPC to be around 3.0 and allow
00127                * for a constant single cycle of expected penalty.
00128                */
00129                   
00130               if (fl->next_flow)
00131                 {
00132                   double pen = (dst_sz + 1.2222) / 2;
00133 
00134                   if (pen < 1.0)
00135                     pen = 1.0;
00136                   if (tk_prob < (1.0 - 1.0 / pen))
00137                     continue;
00138                 }
00139 
00140               if (L_single_predecessor_cb (dst_cb))
00141                 {
00142 #if DEBUG_BR_TGT_EXPN
00143                   fprintf (stderr, "\n>> fn %s: tgt exp (%c) "
00144                            "sp %d(%d) -> %d ",
00145                            fn->name, fl->next_flow ? 'T' : 'F',
00146                            cb->id, br ? br->id : -1, dst_cb->id);
00147 #endif
00148                 }               /* if */
00149               else
00150                 {
00151                   /* Expansion would result in code growth.  Exercise
00152                    * additional care.  
00153                    */
00154 
00155                   if (dst_cb->weight < 1.0)
00156                     continue;
00157 
00158                   if ((fl->weight / dst_cb->weight) < 0.6)
00159                     continue;
00160 
00161                   if (dst_sz > 6)
00162                     continue;
00163 #if DEBUG_BR_TGT_EXPN
00164                   fprintf (stderr, "\n>> fn %s: tgt exp (%c) "
00165                            "%d(%d) -> %d (%d ops repl) ",
00166                            fn->name, fl->next_flow ? 'T' : 'F',
00167                            cb->id, br ? br->id : -1, dst_cb->id, dst_sz);
00168 #endif
00169                 }               /* else */
00170 
00171               if (L_expand_flow (fn, cb, fl,
00172                                  LOPTI_EXPAND_ALLOW_FALLTHRU |
00173                                  LOPTI_EXPAND_ALLOW_UNCOND))
00174                 {
00175 #if DEBUG_BR_TGT_EXPN
00176                   fprintf (stderr, "SUCCEEDED\n");
00177 #endif
00178                   ichg++;
00179                   chg++;
00180                 }               /* if */
00181 #if DEBUG_BR_TGT_EXPN
00182               else
00183                 {
00184                   fprintf (stderr, "FAILED\n");
00185                 }               /* else */
00186 #endif
00187             }                   /* for fl */
00188 
00189           ncb = cb->next_cb;
00190 
00191           /* clean up redundant cond branches */
00192 
00193           if (chg)
00194             {
00195               L_Flow *lfl, *nlfl;
00196 
00197               if ((lfl = L_find_last_flow (cb->dest_flow)) &&
00198                   (nlfl = lfl->prev_flow) && (lfl->dst_cb == nlfl->dst_cb))
00199                 {
00200                   L_Oper *lbr, *nlbr;
00201 
00202                   lbr = L_find_branch_for_flow (cb, lfl);
00203                   nlbr = L_find_branch_for_flow (cb, nlfl);
00204 
00205                   if ((!lbr || L_uncond_branch (lbr)) && nlbr &&
00206                       (nlbr->next_op == lbr))
00207                     {
00208                       L_delete_complete_oper (cb, nlbr);
00209 
00210                       /* Try again to merge with next cb */
00211 
00212                       if (L_single_predecessor_cb (lfl->dst_cb))
00213                         ncb = cb;
00214                     }           /* if */
00215                 }               /* if */
00216             }                   /* if */
00217         }                       /* for cb */
00218       change += ichg;
00219     }                           /* do */
00220   while (ichg);
00221 
00222   return (change);
00223 }                               /* Mopti_branch_target_expansion */
Generated on Sat Aug 30 18:02:29 2014 for libiamopti by  1.4.7
